rules.name: COMM_Outcome_Confirmed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR ( 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6)) AND 7
rules.label: Confirmed

Flow.description: This flow gives the possibility to edit the subscription characteristics or user information in order to efficiently manage the company subscriptions.

formulas.description: Calculate the Subscription End Date after renewal.
formulas.name: COMM_Formula_SubscriptionNewEndDate

formulas.description: Formula to retrieve Subscription's Airport. If Value Field is empty retrieve airport from Subscription's Product
formulas.name: COMM_SubscriptionAirportFormula

formulas.description: Formula for the Airport Admin Queue Name based on Subscription Location
formulas.name: COMM_SubscriptionRequestAirportAdminQueueNameFormula

formulas.description: Formula to obtain the Contact Id that the Case will be associated with. Case will be associated with User's Contact, if he doesn't have one then assign it to Subscription's Contact.
formulas.name: COMM_Variable_ContactId
